splashScreen.title: Mortgage Free,
splashScreen.subTitle: Faster
splashScreen.info: Sprive Limited is an appointed representative of ABCDE Limited which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority

signUp.firstSubTitle: Imagine life without a mortgage. Millions of people will be paying their mortgage through retirement, don’t let that be you.
signUp.secondSubTitle: We suggest the optimal amount to pay. You save more by chipping away regularly rather than paying in big chunks.
signUp.thirdSubTitle: 1.9 million of homeowners could save up to £3,942 annually by remortgaging to a better deal. We help you get it right.
signUp.byClickingText: By clicking on Create Account, you are accepting our
signUp.emailClients: Email Clients found on your device

mortgageForm.title: Your Mortgage
mortgageForm.morgageAmountLabel: Amount left to pay on your Mortgage
mortgageForm.timePeriodLabel: How long until it's fully paid?
mortgageForm.letUsWorkOut: Let's work out how much interest you’re paying
mortgageForm.takeYourBest: Take your best guess for now, you can always update this later

saveInterest.cardText: The amount you’re paying your bank in interest alone
saveInterest.saveMoney: With Sprive, you can save thousands by always being on the best deal and making smarter payments
saveInterest.firstListItem: With Sprive, you will always be on the best deal saving you upto thousands of pounds in a year
saveInterest.secondHeader: Smarter payments to maximise your savings
saveInterest.secondListOne: Pay off your mortgage as quickly as you can
saveInterest.secondListTwo: Chip away without impacting your lifestyle

validationMessages.positiveNumber: Invalid entry. Please re-enter a value more than 0
validationMessages.alphaNumberic: Atleast one character and one number
validationMessages.maxLimitMortgage: Invalid amount. Please re-enter a value less than £10,000,000
validationMessages.maxLimitMonthlyMortgage: Invalid amount. Please re-enter a value less than £10,000
validationMessages.inValidAmount: Invalid amount. Please provide a larger monthly payment amount

setGoalScreen.title: Set Goal
setGoalScreen.howQuickly: How quickly would you like to be Mortgage free?
setGoalScreen.youCanAdjust: You can adjust your goals anytime and no payment will ever leave your account without your approval
setGoalScreen.ercTitle: In potential breach of ERC limit
setGoalScreen.ercMessage: While most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance in a year without incurring Early Repayment Charges (ERC), please check with your lender if you are unsure

dashBoard.keepItUp: You’re on track. Keep it up

statusOverlay.message: Goal not set, please go ahead and set your goal to continue
statusOverlay.messageMortgage: Mortgage data not set, please go ahead and set your Mortgage to proceed
statusOverlay.brilliant: Brilliant! At this rate, you could save £{{interestSaved}} in interest, and pay off your mortgage{{timeSaved}}{{month}}earlier
statusOverlay.wentWrong: Something went wrong Please try again
statusOverlay.mortgageUpdated: Seems like you updated your Mortgage, please go ahead and re-set your goal to proceed

overPaymentHistory.basicInfo: Most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance a year but do check if you’re not sure. You risk being charged early repayment fees if you pay over the permitted amount.

reportIssue.haveAnIssue: Have an issue you want us to look into?
